data.DescriptionHtml:
As major creation ,except items created are permanent and cannot be negated by dispelling magic or negating powers. For all intents and purposes, these items are completely real.

XP Cost: The item's gold piece value, or a minimum of 1 XP.
data.Effect: Unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
data.Name: True Creation
